items.title: Data Protection Day 2026 Panel
items.description: Panel moderation examining whether regulatory frameworks can effectively address the evolving online tracking landscape. Discussion covered the Digital Omnibus proposal, ePrivacy Directive consent principles, and the emerging challenge of AI agents consenting on behalf of users.

rssMetadata.excerpt: Panel moderation examining whether regulatory frameworks can effectively address the evolving online tracking landscape. Discussion covered the Digital Omnibus proposal, ePrivacy Directive consent principles, and the emerging challenge of AI agents consenting on behalf of users.

items.title: AI-Learning by Building: The AI Prompting Trap
items.description: Analysis of how specific prompting language triggers AI over-engineering, with practical frameworks for controlling AI complexity and preventing scope creep in development projects. Blog post provides forensic analysis of actual prompts and their impact on project complexity.

rssMetadata.excerpt: Analysis of how specific prompting language triggers AI over-engineering, with practical frameworks for controlling AI complexity and preventing scope creep in development projects.

items.title: Facebook/Instagram Research Coverage
items.description: Expert commentary on Facebook and Instagram tracking practices featured in major Dutch public broadcaster NOS. Analysis covers smartphone tracking techniques and privacy implications of social media data collection practices on Android devices.

rssMetadata.excerpt: Expert commentary on Facebook and Instagram tracking practices featured in major Dutch public broadcaster NOS. Analysis covers smartphone tracking techniques and privacy implications of social media data collection practices on Android devices.

items.title: OECD Consent Technologies Roundtable
items.description: Keynote moderation of OECD roundtable on emerging consent practices in the digital ecosystem, Paris. Discussion focused on the evolution of consent technologies and their impact on digital privacy frameworks across OECD member countries.

rssMetadata.excerpt: Keynote moderation of OECD roundtable on emerging consent practices in the digital ecosystem, Paris. Discussion focused on the evolution of consent technologies and their impact on digital privacy frameworks across OECD member countries.

items.title: AI-Learning by Building: Creating an Enterprise-Grade Email Security System for Personal Use
items.description: How I created an enterprise-grade email security system for small organizations using AI-assisted development, featuring real-time link verification and threat detection through AWS infrastructure.

rssMetadata.excerpt: How I created an enterprise-grade email security system for small organizations using AI-assisted development, featuring real-time link verification and threat detection through AWS infrastructure.

items.title: Privacy & Generative AI Symposium Recap
items.description: Comprehensive recap of the Privacy & Generative AI Symposium featuring insights from Gary Marcus and expert panels on AI governance, ethics, and human rights.
